justification: Correctly notes B’s contrarian lean, love for deep-threat WRs, and TE depth, but misreads RB depth (B has a Tier 1 RB plus two Tier 3s). Little attention to A’s urgency or B’s injury tolerance. Asking B to give up its only Tier 1 RB for an injured Tier 5 RB, a TE downgrade, and a WR upgrade is misaligned with B’s playoff posture. Rationale is terse and light on specifics.
